Shortcrust Pastry
200g flour
150g butter, from fridge
pinch of salt
Makes enough for 25cm tart (no lid)
  1. Sift the flour and mix in the salt
  2. Rub in the butter, like for shortbread
  3. Sprinkle in enough water so it forms a dough
  4. Bash into a pastie shape and chill in the fridge for 20 minutes before using
